original_title: What Poor Filmmakers Did During the Pandemic?
overview: Ridho, a young and poor filmmaker want to make some movie that got inspiration from 23 Frames movie by Abbas Kiarostami during the pandemic in his home. But he got no help for making this movie, so he shot the movie alone.
tagline: Can we make a movie by ourself?
title: What Poor Filmmakers Did During the Pandemic?
